name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-real-time
title: Real Time News Feed using Azure Logic Apps, Node.js and socket.io
shortDescription: This sample shows you how to implement real time web parts using the SPFx, Azure Logic Apps, Node.js and socket.io.
longDescription: This sample shows you how to implement real time web parts using the SPFx, Azure Logic Apps, Node.js and socket.io.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
